title: First Meaningful Paint
summary: First Meaningful Paint (FMP) is the paint after which the biggest above-the-fold layout change has happened and web fonts have loaded. It is when the answer to "Is it useful?" becomes "yes", upon first meaningful paint completion.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
